004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.jni;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.util.RuntimeLoader;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
010
011/** Eigen JNI. */
012public final class EigenJNI {
013  static boolean libraryLoaded = false;
014
015  static {
016    if (Helper.getExtractOnStaticLoad()) {
017      try {
018        RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
019      } catch (Exception ex) {
020        ex.printStackTrace();
021        System.exit(1);
022      }
023      libraryLoaded = true;
024    }
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Force load the library.
029   *
030   * @throws IOException If the library could not be loaded or found.
031   */
032  public static synchronized void forceLoad() throws IOException {
033    if (libraryLoaded) {
034      return;
035    }
036    RuntimeLoader.loadLibrary("wpimathjni");
037    libraryLoaded = true;
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Computes the matrix exp.
042   *
043   * @param src Array of elements of the matrix to be exponentiated.
044   * @param rows How many rows there are.
045   * @param dst Array where the result will be stored.
046   */
047  public static native void exp(double[] src, int rows, double[] dst);
048
049  /**
050   * Computes the matrix pow.
051   *
052   * @param src Array of elements of the matrix to be raised to a power.
053   * @param rows How many rows there are.
054   * @param exponent The exponent.
055   * @param dst Array where the result will be stored.
056   */
057  public static native void pow(double[] src, int rows, double exponent, double[] dst);
058
059  /**
060   * Performs an inplace rank one update (or downdate) of an upper triangular Cholesky decomposition
061   * matrix.
062   *
063   * @param mat Array of elements of the matrix to be updated.
064   * @param lowerTriangular Whether mat is lower triangular.
065   * @param rows How many rows there are.
066   * @param vec Vector to use for the rank update.
067   * @param sigma Sigma value to use for the rank update.
068   */
069  public static native void rankUpdate(
070      double[] mat, int rows, double[] vec, double sigma, boolean lowerTriangular);
071
072  /**
073   * Solves the least-squares problem Ax=B using a QR decomposition with full pivoting.
074   *
075   * @param A Array of elements of the A matrix.
076   * @param Arows Number of rows of the A matrix.
077   * @param Acols Number of rows of the A matrix.
078   * @param B Array of elements of the B matrix.
079   * @param Brows Number of rows of the B matrix.
080   * @param Bcols Number of rows of the B matrix.
081   * @param dst Array to store solution in. If A is m-n and B is m-p, dst is n-p.
082   */
083  public static native void solveFullPivHouseholderQr(
084      double[] A, int Arows, int Acols, double[] B, int Brows, int Bcols, double[] dst);
085
086  /** Sets whether JNI should be loaded in the static block. */
087  public static class Helper {
088    private static AtomicBoolean extractOnStaticLoad = new AtomicBoolean(true);
089
090    /**
091     * Returns true if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
092     *
093     * @return True if the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
094     */
095    public static boolean getExtractOnStaticLoad() {
096      return extractOnStaticLoad.get();
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Sets whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
101     *
102     * @param load Whether the JNI should be loaded in the static block.
103     */
104    public static void setExtractOnStaticLoad(boolean load) {
105      extractOnStaticLoad.set(load);
106    }
107
108    /** Utility class. */
109    private Helper() {}
110  }
111
112  /** Utility class. */
113  private EigenJNI() {}
114}
